author: ranjit doodnath

review: I was hesitant initially buying this because it only supported Youtube at the time. Over time, they have really added more and more compatibility with various music and video streaming applications online. Whether from the cellphone or laptop, I can stream beautiful content without any skips or glitches. I do hope they continue to add even more compatibility with other applications. The problem is with streaming any webpage that you are on. Then it is usually slow, glitchy, and can become disconnected often (I have very fast internet so that's not a factor). Ideally, it would be great to be able to use the Chromecast when watching any video from your laptop, like a DVD, or other downloaded videos, as opposed to only streaming web content. Either way, I have high hopes for the future of this device.
